ygData.subject: Re: [Holy Swords]
ygData.msgSnippet: Two handed Mithril Sword? Where does that come from I haven t heard of it. Kananek Dwarven Paladin ... From: Avron Elselynn  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Two handed Mithril Sword? Where does that come from I haven't heard of it.

Kananek Dwarven Paladin

-----Original Message-----
From: Avron Elselynn <avron@...>
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, September 13, 1999 2:54 PM
Subject: SV: [eqpaladin] [Holy Swords]


>From: "Avron Elselynn" <avron@...>
>
>Soulfire was RECENTLY found? Hehe someone on Solusek got it about 3 months
ago ;) It's a bitch to get it though, the two handed mithril sword comes
with less effort, and soulfire is CRAP compared to that..
>
>I am going to guk tonight to try and get ghoulbane, already tried camping
it for 7 hours.. I had better luck in lower guk where I got box of abu kar
and bag of sewn evil eye in 30 minutes.. And I am only level 28 hehe, but I
joined up with a level 45 shaman.. It was a fun ride.. ;)
>
>Now I am gonna take a bath.. bye..
>
>- Avron Akizuki(former Elselynn, now married;)
>- Knight of Truth - Solusek Ro
>
>
